analysis.key_quote: Removal of civil servant protections to make it easier to separate poor performing employees will also result in the removal of employees that provide critical support when they are viewed as inconvenient to political environments.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, emphasizing the importance of merit-based hiring and protections for civil servants. It raises concerns about the potential for politicization and loss of institutional knowledge, which aligns with the themes of opposition to the rule.
